title: Server Transfer Update?
body:
I know there is the pinned thread and an update will appear there but it's been 19 days now and I really just want to get my account back from the weird server limbo it's in T_T

Y'all got even the tiniest of news at all? I already missed the Project event due to this downtime and it's really frustrating not hearing anything at all :(

replies.body: Unfortunately I still haven't gotten any new updates on the progress. As always, we'll be sure to update that thread with any news!
